\begin{verbatim}
l = 1
h = 1;
link1  = [ 1 0 0 45];
link2 =  [ 0 90 0 0]
link3 =  [ 16 0 0 0]


links = [link1;link2;link3];
hold on;
set(gca,'YDir','Reverse')
set(gca,'XDir','Reverse')
grid on;
xlabel('X');
ylabel('Y');
zlabel('Z');
A = ones(4,4,length(links(:,1)));
T = ones(4,4,length(links(:,1)));
A = getA(links);
T = getT(A);
x = squeeze(T(1,4,:))
y = squeeze(T(2,4,:));
z = squeeze(T(3,4,:));
x = x';
y = y';
z = z';
xPlot = [0 x];
yPlot = [0 y];
zPlot = [0 z];
plot3(xPlot,yPlot,zPlot,'black','LineWidth',4);
plot3(xPlot(end),yPlot(end),zPlot(end),'x','LineWidth',8);
\end{verbatim}
